word_mean: ［拉］〔NA〕大脑皮质：指整个的大脑皮质，即覆盖大脑半球的灰质外套，分为原脑皮、旧大脑皮质和新大脑皮质(有些分类法中还包括带原脑皮的旧大脑皮质，这两者还常常被不太精确地称为嗅脑)。有时也指处于发育期的大脑皮质

list.abs: ...油画海扇蛤（学名：Chlamys pallium），是莺蛤目海扇蛤科锦海扇蛤属的一种。主要分布于印度尼西亚、台湾，常栖息在浅海。cite web|url=http://shell.sinica.edu.tw/chinese/shellbase_detail.php?science_no=2302.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Latin, literally covering'

means.word_mean: 1. the layer of unmyelinated neurons (the gray matter) forming the cortex of the cerebrum
2. (zoology) a protective layer of epidermis in mollusks or brachiopods that secretes a substance forming the shell
3. (Roman Catholic Church) vestment consisting of a band encircling the shoulders with two lappets hanging in front and back
4. cloak or mantle worn by men in ancient Rome

auth_sentence.content: He removed from around his neck a kind of scarf called the pallium.
auth_sentence.res_content: He removed from around his neck a kind of scarf called the pallium.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He removed from around his neck a kind of scarf called the pallium.

auth_sentence.content: He left his pallium - a symbol of papal authority - on Celestine's tomb.
